type: Amended Bid to Replace a Fence, Saint-Anthony
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Replace a section of fence surrounding the NAVCAN tower at Saint-Anthony airport
description: Design, construct, commissioning and handover of a section of fence surrounding the NAVCAN tower at Saint-Anthony airport, NL by June 01, 2023
full_summary:
# Saint Anthony Fence Replacement
## Description of the Tender

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites Design-Build bidders to design, construct, commission, and handover a section of fence surrounding the NAVCAN tower at Saint Anthony Airport, Labrador.

### Tender Details
- **Reference Number:** WS3735833947-Doc3735878926
- **Amendment Number:** 3
- **Publication Date:** December 5, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date:** January 18, 2023 at 2:00 PM (EST)
- **Description:** The contractor must complete the work by June 1, 2023. The successful bidder will design and construct a new fence to replace the existing one surrounding the NAVCAN tower at Saint Anthony Airport.

### Eligibility

The following Canadian Trade Agreement (CFTA) requirements apply to this tender:

* The bidder must be a Canadian firm or consortium of Canadian firms registered in the Public Services and Procurement Canada Supplier Registration System (SRS).
* The bidder must provide a written confirmation of the Eligibility and Certifications of Compliance with the CFTA, signed by an authorized representative.

### Selection Criteria

The bidder who achieves the highest combined rating in respect of technical merit and price will be selected for the contract.

### Important Notes

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All the required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 18, 2023 at 2:00 PM (EST). Late submissions will be considered non-responsive.

For more information, please see the detailed invitation to submit a proposal document.

Contact Information:
Name: Edward Johnston, SPAC/PSPC  
Email: edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  

Please visit the [Ariba Discovery website](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14811203?extsite=MTQ4MTEyMDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for more details about this tender.  #government-tender #contracting # Canada-grants. [Keyword: contract]
